short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Aliexpress image search on images on the web!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover Products on AliExpress with a Single Click!

Effortlessly find products on AliExpress by using images you encounter online. Whether you're browsing an article, scrolling through social media, or eyeing a product on another website, this extension makes shopping easier than ever.

Key Features:
• Search with ease: Click on any image or use the context menu to start searching on AliExpress instantly.
• Flexible input options: Drag and drop an image file or paste one directly to search.
• Access recent searches: Quickly revisit previous searches through the extension's popup.
• Save time: Find products visually without typing search queries or browsing endlessly.
• Completely free: Enjoy all features of the extension without any cost.

Test it out now and start finding products effortlessly on AliExpress!
